objects.src: <svg xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg' viewBox='0 0 1080 1080'><defs><linearGradient id='bg-gradient' x1='0%' y1='0%' x2='100%' y2='100%'><stop offset='0%' style='stop-color:#0f0f0f;stop-opacity:1'/><stop offset='100%' style='stop-color:#3c3c3c;stop-opacity:1'/></linearGradient><linearGradient id='accent-gradient' x1='0%' y1='0%' x2='100%' y2='0%'><stop offset='0%' style='stop-color:#f388a7;stop-opacity:0.7'/><stop offset='100%' style='stop-color:#f388a7;stop-opacity:0'/></linearGradient></defs><rect width='1080' height='1080' fill='url(#bg-gradient)'/><rect x='40' y='40' width='1000' height='1000' rx='20' stroke='#8c8c92' stroke-width='3' fill='none' opacity='0.6'/><rect x='60' y='60' width='960' height='960' rx='15' stroke='#ffffff' stroke-width='1' fill='none' opacity='0.3'/><circle cx='540' cy='540' r='400' fill='none' stroke='#8c8c92' stroke-width='1' opacity='0.2'/><circle cx='540' cy='540' r='300' fill='none' stroke='#8c8c92' stroke-width='1' opacity='0.3'/><path d='M0,280 C150,250 300,300 450,280 C600,260 750,300 900,280 C1000,265 1050,250 1080,260 L1080,0 L0,0 Z' fill='url(#accent-gradient)' opacity='0.3'/><path d='M0,800 C150,830 300,780 450,800 C600,820 750,780 900,800 C1000,815 1050,830 1080,820 L1080,1080 L0,1080 Z' fill='url(#accent-gradient)' opacity='0.3'/><rect x='90' y='90' width='900' height='900' fill='rgba(0,0,0,0.5)' rx='10'/><rect x='100' y='100' width='880' height='880' fill='none' rx='8' stroke='#ffffff' stroke-width='1' opacity='0.2'/></svg>

objects.text:
50MP AI-Enhanced Camera
8K Video Recording
Long-Lasting Battery
Unlocked 256GB Smartphone

product_details.description: Plus-up your day with Galaxy AI on Galaxy S24+. Wonder where your favorite influencer got their shoes? Simply Circle to Search* with Google to see where you can buy your own pair. Then snap a photo to show off your new kicks and elevate your pic from good to great on Galaxy S24+.  Before you head out in style, call up that new authentic Japanese restaurant to make a reservation and impress the staff as you use Live Translate* to speak their language in real time. And with our most powerful processor yet, you can smoothly switch between texting friends, taking photos of your food and searching for your next culinary adventure.  With Galaxy AI on GalaxyS24+, life just got a whole lot easier —and a lot more fun. Epic, just like that.

banner_details:
This banner features a modern, high-tech promotional design for a premium smartphone product. The layout utilizes layered vector elements and subtle gradient backgrounds to create depth and sophistication. The primary **heading** (ID: `heading`) uses a futuristic bold sans-serif font in white for maximum visibility. Beneath it, the **subheading** (ID: `subheading`) in pink communicates the luxury aspect of the product. A list of product features is neatly summarized in the **description** (ID: `description`) to the left of the prominently displayed **product image** (ID: `product_image`). The **price** (ID: `price`) is eye-catching in bold pink with a red **CTA button** (ID: `cta_button`) labeled with white text from layer `cta`. The layout is framed with soft gradient-wave overlays and multiple rounded stroke rectangles, adding a sleek tech appeal.

**Color Palette:**
- Gradient Black: `#0f0f0f` to `#3c3c3c`
- Highlight Pink: `#f388a7`
- Accent Red: `#ff0000`
- White: `#ffffff`
- Light Grey Stroke: `#8c8c92`
product_color: The product image showcases a sleek and modern design with a minimalist color palette, ideal for a sophisticated advertisement banner. Predominant colors include Soft Silver Gray (#E4E4E4) on the device's body, deep Black (#000000) around the camera lenses and edges, and subtle gradients of Pearl White (#F9F9F9) and Light Champagne Yellow (#F3EAC2) present in the wallpaper. These colors blend smoothly, using a gradient style that highlights the curvature and premium texture. Glitter-like sparkles add depth and elegance. For an ad banner, combining these with accents of charcoal gray (#333333) and pastel yellow (#FFF3B2) can create a balanced, luxurious theme.
